alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 6:56AM EST until January 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM EST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. The snow may briefly mix with sleet tonight. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches, with amounts near 20 inches for the Chautauqua Ridge and Boston Hills. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will produce significant blowing and drifting snow Monday afternoon and Monday night. * WHERE...Wyoming, Chautauqua, Cattaraugus, and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult or even nearly impossible with deep snow cover on roads and very poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute Monday.
info.instruction: Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
